thread.title: Michael J Fox & Christopher Lloyd Crash 'Jimmy Kimmel Live' On 'Back To The Future' Day
thread.title_full: Michael J Fox & Christopher Lloyd Crash 'Jimmy Kimmel Live' On 'Back To The Future' Day

author: Bill Bradley
title: Michael J Fox & Christopher Lloyd Crash 'Jimmy Kimmel Live' On 'Back To The Future' Day
text:
Michael J Fox & Christopher Lloyd Crash 'Jimmy Kimmel Live' On 'Back To The Future' Day Marty McFly and Doc Brown are going back to the future! Bill Bradley Entertainment Editor, The Huffington Post Posted: 10/22/2015 02:09 AM EDT ABC 
"Jimmy Kimmel Live" just cranked it up to 1.21 gigawatts. 
On Oct. 21, 2015, Marty McFly and Doc Brown officially arrived in the future, and you can probably guess where they ended up. I get some VERY special visitors from the past tonight... #BackToTheFuture #KimmelinBrooklyn @RealMikeFox pic.twitter.com/2ofZIzMBLt — Jimmy Kimmel (@jimmykimmel) October 21, 2015 
Michael J. Fox and Christopher Lloyd crashed Jimmy Kimmel 's monologue on Wednesday during "Back to the Future" Day by coming on stage in their DeLorean time machine. The Huffington Post watched it happen live at the taping in Brooklyn, NY, and -- Great Scott! -- it was amazing. 'Back to the Future' fans are going to want to stay up for 'Jimmy Kimmel Live!' tonight: https://t.co/RislYzjXul pic.twitter.com/CImQSfUT0H — ABC 7 Chicago (@ABC7Chicago) October 22, 2015 
Like all of us, Marty and Doc were surprised there weren't more flying cars and hoverboards nowadays. As Marty eloquently puts it, "2015 kind of sucks." 
The pair weren't totally unimpressed with the future, however. They were pretty astounded by smart phones , happy the Cubs made the playoffs and obviously seemed to catch on with selfies pretty fast. 
Buckle up. If our calculations are correct, this segment about to hit 88 miles per hour, and when that happens... "Jimmy Kimmel Live" airs weeknights at 11:35 p.m. ET on ABC. Also on HuffPost: Celebrity Families Then And Now of
